title: Silver Tops $100 as Global Turmoil Fuels Run for Safe Havens
description: Silver topped $100 an ounce for the first time, extending a scorching rally built on surging demand for haven assets and frenzied buying in retail markets from Shanghai to New York.
content: Silver topped $100 an ounce for the first time, extending a scorching rally built on surging demand for haven assets and frenzied buying in retail markets from Shanghai to New York.
